Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Author:
OGUZHAN SENTURK This class controls the data flow into model and updates view whenever data changes
